thig16.1:3.2: She uses the term bhavagata (“state of life”) seven times. It is not found elsewhere in early Pali, only once in the late Pe 5:72.2.
thig16.1:55.3: A reference to the metaphor for gluttony at MN 67:17.1 and AN 4.122:3.1.
thig16.1:58.3: The same sense is expressed in prose at AN 5.227:1.3.
